citations.narrative:
The enclosure for the Eagle Owl needs to be addressed. The wooden platform off the shelter box is in disrepair with wood
that is beginning to rot away and break down. Underneath the platform where the mesh meets the solid bottom wall, there
are two screws that are exposed and protruding into the enclosure. These areas need to be addressed to keep the
enclosure in good repair for the safety of the owl.
Correct by: Sept 6, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
